meanings.definition: Assigning new numbers to items in a series.
meanings.sent1: I am renumbering the books in the library to make them easier to find.
meanings.sent2: The librarian is renumbering the shelves to organize the books better.
meanings.sent3: The renumbering of the books caused confusion among the library visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her methodical renumbering of the files was like a symphony of organization.
meanings.sent5: The renumbering process brought a sense of order to the chaotic library.

meanings.definition: Changing the order of numbers in a sequence.
meanings.sent1: The renumbering of the pages in the book made it hard to follow the story.
meanings.sent2: The renumbering of the chapters in the textbook confused the students.
meanings.sent3: The renumbering of the street addresses led to some interesting mail mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: The renumbering of the train cars created a new system for passengers to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The renumbering of the lottery balls added an element of suspense to the game.
